title: Funeral arrangements announced for 7-year-old shot at birthday party
content:
GREENSBORO, AL (WBRC) -
Funeral arrangements have been made for a seven-year-old boy shot and killed at a birthday party.
Decorrin Johnson was outside his family's home in Greensboro on Saturday night when he was caught in the crossfire of two men shooting at each other.
Johnson's funeral will be held on Saturday, September 13 at 11 a.m. at Union Grove Baptist Church in Greensboro.
Police say Lavares Jackson and JaPaul Williams were fighting over a girl who lives in Johnson's neighborhood.
The two are charged with capital murder in this case.
A vigil for Johnson will be held on Wednesday, September 10 at Lyon's Park in Greensboro.
Related: Mother of slain 7-year-old speaks out
